snippet: A small fire outside the building created the smoke, which filled the Hall of the Northwest Coast Indians; the museum will reopen Saturday.
abstract: Small fire breaks out near American Museum of Natural History in Manhattan, filling exhibition hall with smoke; everyone is evacuated safely.
lead_paragraph: A small fire outside the building created the smoke, which filled the Hall of the Northwest Coast Indians; the museum will reopen Saturday.

headline.main: American Museum of Natural History Evacuated Because of Smoke
headline.print_headline: Smoke Prompts an Evacuation at a Museum
